strapiPost.title: Airbus A220 Arrives At XNA
strapiPost.content:
The Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) is getting a complimentary upgrading from economy seating to first class with a bigger fleet from Breeze Airway.

  • Roomy: Breeze Airways is sporting XNA’s first Airbus A220 for its nonstop Tampa, Florida route. The Airbus A220 ranges between having 100-150 seats total, with 10-45 seats with extra legroom and between 12-36 first class seats. 
  • A nice getaway: Flights with first class seating will be offered every Monday, Friday, and Saturday through mid September and will be available to book starting May 6. An introductory fare, nicknamed the “Nicest” fare, will be available to book for $99 until Tuesday, Jan. 25.

Fore more information, click HERE.
